resources.string: If you would like to donate water to Flint, you can donate to the locations listed below.

Donations of 100 or less cases of water 
 Please go to: 
 Catholic Charities Center for Hope 
 517 E. Fifth Ave 
 Flint, MI 48503 
 Monday-Friday 9am-4pm

Red Cross 
 1401 Grand Traverse 
 Flint, MI 48503 
 Saturday-Sunday 9am-4pm

Donations greater than 100 cases 
 Please go to: 
 Food Bank of Eastern Michigan 
 2300 Lapeer Rd 
 Flint, MI 48503 
 Monday-Friday 8am-4:30pm
